definition.content: Embrace is a mobile observability and data platform that empowers mobile teams to deliver optimal user experiences via performance optimization, issue prioritization and remediation, and monitoring across features, releases, and custom segments. Learn more about [how our customers are using Embrace](https://embrace.io/case-studies/wish/) today!

Embrace collects comprehensive session-level data that mobile teams use for performance and stability optimizations. Embrace provides dashboards that track key mobile health metrics that are surfaced in Datadog. This allows mobile teams to view client and server data in a single view, which provides better visibility and faster response times. 

With this integration, mobile teams can monitor an entire stack from a single location. In one unified workflow, spot a regression and investigate the full session details with a single click. The result is the quickest way to go from incident, to impact, to resolution.

## Metrics

- Crash
- Networking
- App Performance
- Logs
- ANRs
- App Health
- Adoption
- Engagement

## Integration Documentation 

Welcome to Embrace! The ability to see client and server side data in a single view can be powerful.

1. Start a free trial with Embrace and follow the [Embrace documentation](https://embrace.io/docs/). **You'll need to follow this documentation before seeing metrics in Datadog.**
2. After completing setup of the Embrace integration, navigate back to Datadog to connect both platforms.
3. Authenticate and connect your Embrace account to Datadog by logging in with your credentials.
5. Select the Embrace widget to display Embrace data with crash or networking metrics.
6. Click into "Details" to dive deeper into Embrace from Datadog.

Reach out to Datadog support if you have any questions.
